about_the_game:
Three different kinds of sunglasses for those who want to take fashion to the next level.

Circle Shades x 10
Fancy Shades x 10
Sport Shades x 10

*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page. After obtaining the items, they can be equipped from the Costume page on the Camp Menu.
